scripts.mac-nextapp-tailwind: rm -rf mac-nextapp-tailwind && npx tsx ../packages/create-template/src/index.ts -n mac-nextapp-tailwind -t react -f next/app -c tailwind --use-all-components && cd mac-nextapp-tailwind && pnpm i && pnpm build && pnpm test
scripts.mac-nextapp-vanillaextract: rm -rf mac-nextapp-vanillaextract && npx tsx ../packages/create-template/src/index.ts -n mac-nextapp-vanillaextract -t react -f next/app -c vanilla-extract --use-all-components && cd mac-nextapp-vanillaextract && pnpm i && pnpm build && pnpm test
